title: The Sea, my native land
creator_credit: Multifilm Studios and United Nations. Film Board
brief_description: Shows the special problems of sailors - their loneliness and insecurity. Dramatises the help which international codes and health provisions render to sailors at sea: a young seaman is saved when his captain treats his illness according to radio instructions from a liner, although doctor and captain speak different languages.
